context: In 2010, Paycom was a regional payroll company based in Oklahoma City growing its cloud-based HCM platform. ADP and Paychex dominated payroll services. The market was transitioning from service bureaus to software platforms. Ultimate Software and Workday were emerging cloud HCM competitors. Paycom differentiated with single-database architecture and employee self-service. The company was building toward its 2014 IPO.
